bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Daniel Mauger, a student, is believed to have been about ten years of age when completing the penmanship exercises in his writing books.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: The Mauger mss., 1805-1807, consists of the writing books used by Daniel Mauger. The collection includes five manuscript writing books overall, owned and inscribed by Mauger, and dated 1805-1807. The books contain Mauger's various exercises in penmanship, including practice writing his name, the alphabet, numbers, and maxims written at the top of the page in the instructor's handwriting.
